allow:
Bash(python -c "
import pickle
import os
token_file = ''token.pickle''
if os.path.exists(token_file):
    with open(token_file, ''rb'') as f:
        creds = pickle.load(f)
    print(''Client ID:'', getattr(creds, ''client_id'', ''Not found''))
    print(''Client Secret:'', getattr(creds, ''client_secret'', ''Not found''))
    print(''Refresh Token:'', getattr(creds, ''refresh_token'', ''Not found''))
else:
    print(''token.pickle not found'')
")
